RCAT Statistics

Functions controlling statistical calculations

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.default_stats_config(stats)

The function returns a dictionary with default statistics configurations for a selection of statistics given by input stats.

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.mod_stats_config(...)

Get the configuration for the input statistics 'requested_stats'.

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.calc_statistics(...)

Calculate statistics 'stat' according to configuration in 'stat_config'.

Statistical functions

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.moments(data, ...)

Calculate standard moment statistics: avg, median, std, max/min

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.seasonal_cycle(...)

Calculate seasonal cycle

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.annual_cycle(...)

Calculate annual cycle

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.diurnal_cycle(...)

Calculate diurnal cycle

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.dcycle_harmonic_fit(...)

Calculate diurnal cycle with Harmonic oscillation fit

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.percentile(data, ...)

Calculate percentiles

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.freq_int_dist(...)

Calculate frequency intensity distributions

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.asop(data, var, ...)

Calculate ASoP components for precipitation

rcatool.runtime.RCAT_stats.Rxx(data, var, ...)

Count of any time units (days, hours, etc) when precipitation ≥ xx mm.
